= Introduction =

ZIPTool is used to purify Quake3 PK3 files.

What does this mean?? 

Essentially someone who wants to have client side modifications can now do so without having to worry about whether or not the server is set to PURE.

= Details =


How Do I Use ZIPTool?

==1. Download==
Find the Downloads link at the top of the page and download the ziptool-2.0.0.tar.gz package
== 2. Compile==
via command line

{{{
$ tar xzf ziptool-2.0.0.tar.gz
$ cd ziptool-2.0.0
$ ./confiugre
$ make
$ sudo make install
}}}

==3. Purify==

{{{
$ ziptool pure.pk3 unpure.pk3
}}}
